details: Periodical nervous sick headaches, with asthenopia, weak digestion, constipation. Catarrh. Suits debilitated, nervous, literary patients, with frequent headaches, dyspepsia and constipation.

Head: Cracking in cervical vertebrae when moving the head
Pain on top as from a nail
Pressure on vertex, in morning; worse till noon and in warm room
Stitches
Objects appear too large
Migraine; first on left side
Twitching of upper lip
Respiratory: Dry, hacking cough, with stitches in chest
OBLIGED TO SIT UP AND HOLD HEAD
MUST PUT ARMS ON THIGHS, WHEN COUGHING
Nose: Nasal catarrh, with redness and swelling at tip of nose
Acute pain at root of nose, extending to vertex and through temples
Female: Menses late, scanty, with great debility and burning in eyes
Profuse leucorrhoea; worse, after urinating ; also worse after menses
Skin: Itching all over, worse on neck, not relieved by scratching
Throat: Sore, right side with great tenderness; SORENESS TO TOUCH EXTERNALLY
Gone, empty feeling in epigastrium, WITHOUT DESIRE FOR FOOD
Acute gastralgia with pains extending to shoulder
Sour, fetid secretions ooze from molar teeth

name: Niccolum
